definition: Li He (790-816), Tang poet and author of 南园十三首

sentences.english: Li He's life transient, but full of legendary flavour.
sentences.chinese: 李賀一生是短促的，又是充滿傳奇色彩的。

sentences.english: That is the reason for Li He's acceptance of Chuci.
sentences.chinese: 李賀對楚辭的接受也包括這兩個方面。

sentences.english: Li He was a poet peculiar to the middle of Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 李賀是中唐時代一位獨特的詩人。

sentences.english: Why Li He died at the age of 27 has been a mystery.
sentences.chinese: 李賀27歲而沒，其死因至今是一個謎。

definition: Luo Binwang (640-684), one of Four Great Poets of the Early Tang 初唐四傑|初唐四杰[Chu1 Tang2 Si4 jie2]
see 呂洞賓|吕洞宾[Lu:3 Dong4 bin1]
mulberry farming/to grow mulberry for sericulture
Longsha district of Qiqihar city 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang
booklet/brochure/(old) book (made of bamboo strips tied together)

notes on poetry, an essay genre consisting of informal commentary on poems and poets and their lives (old)/a genre of narrative literature interspersing prose with poetry, popular in the Tang and Song dynasties
(literary) (of a married woman) to visit one's parents
Shen Yue (441-513), writer and historian during Liang of Southern dynasties 南朝梁, compiler of History of Song of the Southern dynasties 宋書|宋书
